summary: I saw someone comment that there aren't many CME saves out there for people who aren't very good at making faces, so I tried making one.
descriptionHtml: Basically, I have 7base, Univision, SG texture, SG Hair pack (HelloSanta) , Eyes of Beauty... Actually, I may have more. Anyway, you only really need the hair, eyes and skin for her to look alright. And of course Enhanced Character Edit. To install, just put it in C:\Users\[your name]\Documents\My Games\skyrim\CME_save . To load it, use the slot load slider in the body tab. Currently she's named Hana (a lovely Jewish name that is also Japanese; I like using odd names) but I don't know if the load saves that as well. Personally, I expect no downloads at all. Enjoy.
author: spyrkle
